name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
The first word has seven letters -

To speak quietly or secretly.

Now drop one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make the new word of six letters- 

To  destroy or to die.

A five letter word -

Highest point of grand building, often churches, which tapers to a point.

A four letter word - 

Fruit that is mature and ready to eat.

A three letter word -

Baked food of a filling with a pastry crust.

Start a new word of seven letters -

Hand made with care and skill.

A six letter word - 

To have followed a trail, or copied through transparent paper.

A five letter word - 

To respond to a stimulus.

A four letter word -

A wheeled vehicle pushed by hand, or a two wheeled vehicle pulled by horse.

A three letter word - 

To perform in a play or film.
